\begin{verbatim}
void Rectangle::read(inputbuffer &buffer) {
}

void Rectangle::write(ostream &){
}

void Rectangle::draw(char ch) {
   int anchorRow, anchorCol;
   Location loc  = getLocation();
   anchorRow = loc.getRow();
   anchorCol = loc.getCol();
   move (anchorRow,anchorCol);
   // Draw left side
   int row = anchorRow;
   int col = anchorCol;
   int n = getSize();
   addch(ch);
   while (row < anchorRow + n - 2) {
       row++;
       move(row,col);
       addch(ch);
   }
   while (col > anchorCol - n/2 + 2) {
       col--;
       move(row,col);
       addch(ch);
   }
   while (row > anchorRow) {
       row--;   // up one, left
       move(row,col);
       addch(ch);
   }
   while (col < anchorCol) {
        col++;  // up one, left
       move(row,col);
       addch(ch);
   }
}

\end{verbatim}
\end{document}
